name: SCORCH
description: Set your heart ablaze, and scorch your enemies with a slice, dealing {minDamage}-{maxDamage} guaranteed damage.

start: With a fiery resolve, you prepare to unleash your {attack_name}.
You gather your strength, preparing to scorch your foe with {attack_name}.
Your weapon hums with intensity as you get ready to strike with {attack_name}.
The air around you heats up as you focus on delivering a searing {attack_name}.
A rush of heat surges through you as you brace for the {attack_name} strike.
hit: You strike with fierce heat, dealing {damage} damage with {attack_name}!
Your {attack_name} hits with a fiery burst, inflicting {damage} damage!
With intense precision, your {attack_name} scorches the enemy for {damage} damage!
The flames of your {attack_name} sear your opponent, causing {damage} damage!
Your {attack_name} lands with a fiery explosion, dealing {damage} damage!
crit: A critical hit! Your {attack_name} burns through your target, dealing {damage} damage!
You strike with blinding force! A critical hit for {damage} damage!
The fire of your {attack_name} erupts, delivering a critical hit for {damage} damage!
Your {attack_name} hits like a furnace, a critical blow for {damage} damage!
A fiery critical strike lands, scorching your target for {damage} damage!
